lore: Warhogs are often used in the illegal creature fights that are held in the slums of the big cities of Rodia, as well as in territories owned by crime syndicates.\n\nThe Barbed Warhog spends up to sixteen hours a day sleeping, hidden under its spiky carapace. It usually inhabits places where it can easily camouflage itself, and when it notices prey, it rolls into a ball to run over it from a higher ground.
menagerieDialog: (It's busy snorting and sniffing at the ground. Not exactly the smartest creature you've ever met.)
(It's rolling around in a pile of what you hope is mud.)
(If your kingdom ever falls on hard times, Warhogs may prove useful in warding off the threat of famine.)
(It's proudly holding an apple in its mouth. You doubt it understands the irony of its actions.)
(Its tusks seem a bit dull. Nortah must be slacking off lately.)
name: Barbed Warhog
